name: Fluff
description:
If you’re looking for a casual, simple game to unwind and relax to, you might just be looking for Fluff.
It has a very cute and cozy atmosphere that is meant for those looking to take their mind off of things.
The goal in Fluff is to simply collect fluff balls that are loose and fill them into jars, all while being accompanied by a feline companion.

Game Features
  • Meditative gameplay
  • Relaxing music and atmosphere
  • Illustrated by Spica Illustrations
